product_name: Swix Marcy Gloves - Women's - Special Buy
long_description: Explore the winter landscape on skis or by foot wearing the waterproof, insulated Swix Marcy gloves. aquaVENT Hi-performance waterproof, breathable inserts and MicroLoft polyester fiber insulation keep your hands dry and warm. Short gauntlet cuffs with double-sided microfleece wrists keep snow and cold air from getting in. Full leather palms offer good grip of ski poles. Use the nylon webbing straps to adjust the fit of the Swix Marcy gloves. Special buy.
short_description: Explore the winter landscape on skis or by foot wearing the waterproof, insulated Swix Marcy gloves.
